<cs> my lords may i clear up one extra point <e> <s> the olympic games do not belong to the host countrythey belong to the international olympic committee <e> <s> is the noble lord aware that the international olympic committee take over all the stadiums <e> <s> that is why when hitler was there in all the propaganda was taken down in the stadium under the instructions of the international olympic committee <e> <s> is the noble lord aware that the international olympic committee and all the federations which run the technical side of the sports which are completely worldwide own the games <e> <s> the facilities are provided by the host country and naturally if they do them well they are proud of them as all other host countries have been in times past <e>
